TransactionId.description: Unique identifier as assigned by ClearBank.

EndToEndId.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the initiating party, to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

DebtorName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to debit funds.

DebtorAccount.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the account to which a debit entry will be made as a result of the transaction.

CreditorName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to credit funds.

CreditorAccount.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the account to which a credit entry will be posted as a result of the payment transaction.

InstructedCurrency.description: Currency of the instructed payment. This is the 3-letter ISO currency code.

SchemePaymentMethod.description: Payment scheme used to submit the transaction.

TimestampCreated.description: Date and time transaction was created, in UTC.
